name: Falling Friends
description:
Falling Friends

Falling Friends is a multiplayer party-game up to 4 players to play with friends and family. The goal is to be the last one standing, avoiding falling into the water and using different abilities against the other players. There are multiple maps and different events in the environment that give rise to different gameplays.

It was developed in 10 weeks by 5 university students using Unity 3D Engine.

🏆 BEST VIDEOGAME AWARD 2019 🏆 - Tecnogames (Pompeu Fabra University) Have a great time playing Falling Friends! Development Team
